DOC.brief_summary: In Taiwan , 15 % general population hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) infection , HBV lead cause liver cirrhosis hepatocellular carcinoma Taiwan . After enter immune clearance , 10-30 % patient chronic HBV develop acute exacerbation ( AE ) , mild develop hepatic decompensation even death . Previous study find early use lamivudine bilirubin level 20 mg/dl improve survival chornic HBV severe AE . From study Hongkong , lamivudine find good survival entecavir chronic HBV severe AE . Recent study India find tenofovir able improve survival chronic HBV severe AE . The aim study compare effect lamivudine tenofovir chronic HBV severe AE . The study aim enroll 120 patient chronic HBV define persistence HBsAg 6 month . Severe AE define ALT > 400 U/L , prolongation prothrombin time > 3 second , bilirubin > 2 mg/dl . Patients hepatitis A , C , D HIV infection , drug alcoholic liver disease , hepatocellular carcinoma , immuno-suppressive agent use , previous use anti-HBV agent exclude . All enrol patient randomize group A receive tenofovir 300 mg qd 3 year group B receive lamivuidne 100 mg qd 6 month , follow tenofovir 300mg qd 30 month . Mortality rate virological , biochemical serological response evaluate 1,2,4,48,96 144 week . The value express mean + SD . Categorical variable analyze Chi-square test Fisher 's exact test appropriate continuous variable analyze Mann-Whitney test . Logistic regression test apply analyze independent association various variable outcome . A p value < 0.05 regarded significant .
